tool.name: Merge GFF3 into GenBank
tool.description: Merge GFF3 data into a GenBank file
tool.help:
Merge GFF features into a GenBank File ======================================
Useful to add features from GFF producing analysis tools to a GenBank File.
Known Bugs ----------
- Currently only supports GenBank files with single records (i.e. you cannot export a GenBank DB, produce gff3 against many subfeatures, and then expect those to be merged correctly) - Fasta file is ignored
